body_content.explanation: to improve the quality or usefulness of something, or change it for something newer or of a better standard:
examples: It's very simple to upgrade the indexing software.
Consider upgrading your buildings insurance policy every five to 10 years.
They have not yet upgraded to fully digitial technology.

body_content.explanation: to give someone something of a better standard, or newer, for example a better seat on a plane or a better room in a hotel:
examples: If your reserved car isn't available, most rental car companies will upgrade you to the next size car at no additional charge.
We were upgraded and flew business class.

body_content.explanation: a piece of software or equipment that improves the quality or usefulness of a computer or machine:
an occasion when someone is given something of a better standard, or newer, for example a better seat on a plane, a better room in a hotel, or a new phone:
examples: I got an upgrade to first class on the plane on the way back.
About six months ago I got an upgrade on my mobile phone and my new model has an excellent camera.
